artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guiseppe Asioli; Artist: After Simone Cantarini
description: Blessed Virgin seated on a cloud surrounded by cherubs; below St. John the Evangelist, St. Nicholas and St. Eufemia; lion's head in lower right corner
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ S. Cantarini dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Asioli inc./ LA VERGINE  S. GEO EVANGELISTA  S. NICOLA DA TOLENTINO/ E. S. EUFEMIA]; on sheet in pencil: [1-222]
title: La B. Vergine S. Geo Evangelista S. Nicola Da Tolentino/ E. S. Eufemia
